summary: Lou, a former professional golfer, turned motivational speaker, seems to have it all: fame, money, and a beautiful live-in girlfriend, Alex. Her seemingly perfect life is turned upside down when she is attacked near her home in Manhattan.
cast: Ally Sheedy|Patsy Kensit|Stephen Baldwin|Chris Penn|Mimi Langeland|Denia Brache|Chris Douridas|Joanna Glushak|Scott Sanford|Joey Gironda|Margaret Reed|Timothy Devlin|Lou Ruggiero|Jack Mulcahy|Jennifer Alexander|Robert Z. Grant
title: La isla del miedo
